title: Comic relief
creator_credit: Comic Relief, BBC-TV, Ed Bye, Richard Curtis, Roger Graef, Philip Chilvers, Paul Jackson and Geoff Posner
brief_description: A live show to fight famine in Ethiopia and the Sudan, recorded on April 4, 5, 6 1986 at the Shaftesbury Theatre, London (home of the theatre of comedy) featuring some of Britain’s top comedians and entertainers including Rowan Atkinson, Billy Connolly, French and Saunders, Stephen Fry, Kate Bush, Ben Elton, Bob Geldof, Rick Mayall, Cliff Richard, Midge Ure, Spitting Image and more. NB: Uncensored and includes material which some people may find offensive.
